data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Zunheboto, Nagaland, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zunheboto, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Zunheboto, Nagaland, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Zunheboto.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Zunheboto to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Boria Assam people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Boria Assam people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Zunheboto words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Zunheboto, Nagaland, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Zunheboto with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Zunheboto
location.people_groups_list: Deori, Arleng, Kuki Chin Kholhang, Abor, Kuki Chin Sokte
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deori (52,000), Arleng (497,000), Kuki Chin Kholhang (10,000), Abor (1,600), Kuki Chin Sokte (700)
